type.title: Scrape type
type.description: Select what kind of data to scrape: user, hashtag, trend, music, or single video

query.title: Query
query.description: Username, hashtag (without #), music ID, or video URL depending on the type

number.title: Number of posts
number.description: Number of posts to scrape (0 = all posts)

filetype.title: Output file type
filetype.description: Type of output file to save scraped data

download.title: Download videos
download.description: Enable this to download videos. Leave false to skip downloading

sessionFile.title: Session file URL
sessionFile.description: URL or local path to your TikTok session.txt file

apifyProxyGroups.title: Apify Proxy Group
apifyProxyGroups.description: Name of the Apify proxy group to use (RESIDENTIAL recommended for less blocking)
